channel.title: Anarchy V2 - "Ikov Remake"
channel.description:
[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img12/5928/hzbq.png[/img][/center]
[size=18pt][center]-Anarchy is a 317 server loading higher revision data, we mix our data giving you different revisions of maps and items so that we can optimise our content. At Anarchy we strive for perfection, we understand even the smallest bug is important and we gain great pleasure from being able to confidently say we update more than almost any other server out there and we plan to keep it this way, don't believe us? Check up our update board! Our staff team at Anarchy comes with a vast amount of experience and professionalism and are always looking to help, even us owners will dedicate a portion of our busy day to come ingame and answer questions and communicate with the players as we believe this to be part of the key to a successful and thriving community. So come join us, check us out and see what you're missing out on. We're full of unique fun content and you may even make a friend or two.[/center][/size]
[center][img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/pkD456e.png[/img][/center] [center][code][center]- Bank Pins Dwarf Multicannon 120+ Achievements SoulWars ClanWars Contruction Team Dungeoneering Social Slayer (Duo Slayer) Daily Updates Hosted on a top dedicated server guaranteeing uptime. Fully functional bank tabs Complete clan chat system Multiple World support Multiple Quests Active wilderness Flawless combat 23 working skills! Customizable Client Active community forum Mix of 474, 525, and 667 maps. Gambling Tons of fun minigames 10+ Bosses Money pouch with unlimited storage Pking highscores[/center] [/code] [center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img835/1488/s5ni.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img843/4421/6xyw.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img835/5462/f58z.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img843/3671/towa.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img835/4729/shjz.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img843/8236/gwdu.png[/center][/img] [size=18pt][font=arial black]TO PLAY PLEASE CLICK THE SPOILER BELOW[/font][/size] [spoiler]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/366ep4q7dy53udm/Anarchy.jar[/spoiler]
